content:
"(define (group-by-index key lst)
  "Group lst by key(index)."
  (map (lambda (x) (map car x))
       (group-by (lambda (p)
                   (key (cdr p)))
                 (for/list ([x lst]
                            [i (in-naturals)])
                   (cons x i)))))

(define (group-by-2 lst)
  "group every 2 items"
  (group-by-index (lambda (idx) (floor (/ idx 2))) lst))"
